synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, embracing a life of exploration, creativity, and self-discovery. He reflects on the importance of taking breaks, connecting with oneself, and pursuing passions without the pressure of expectations, all while sharing humorous anecdotes from his travels and experiences.
quotes: Sometimes it takes an incredible amount of courage and privilege to take that leap into something unknown.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
You can make a good show, but the world may not be ready for it.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
If I'm DJing, I'm doing it because I want to perform for people and take them through a musical journey.
It's not about the results; it's about the process.
Your time and your energy are valuable.
If you have privilege, you should use it.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. Like that's okay.
I just thought it was so beautiful... the opportunity to connect with the world a little bit.
